post.text: Tomorrow caps an amazing journey, but the work we have to do is just beginning. What I've seen these past 17 months makes it clear to me that we're up to the challenge, because we truly are stronger together.

comment.author: Tyler
comment.text: You go Hillary! Make America even more powerful, stronger together!

replies.author: Alexander
replies.text: Hillary Clinton aided and abetted a child abduction and most likely human trafficking program in Haiti after the earthquake. Her friend and partner in crime was arrested and convicted in Haiti for trying to steal 33 children WITH parents. The woman's name is Laura Silsby and her foe foundation was New Life. Search Wikileaks to see the total fear of Hillary Clinton and her attorney Cheryl mills. Then search Bing- not Google- which is censored. This woman is pure evil. NYPD and NY FBI have both stated there is evidence of Clinton's involvement in human trafficking on Anthony Weiner's computer as well as many trips to pedophile island by both mr. And Mrs. Clinton. Please vote Trump and end this horror known as the Clintons! Save the children!
